name: Rove
headline: Travel the world for free.
description: Rove is building the first accessible and universal airline mile, redeemable across dozens of international airlines and hotel chains worldwide.

founders.name: Arhan Chhabra, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Rove | Harvard CS & Economics

### BETTER TRAVEL POINTS
## The Credit Card That Helps You Travel
Explore more with every transaction. With Rove, each purchase paves the way towards complimentary flights and hotel stays through our travel partners.
BENEFITS
# Premier Rewards
**2X** on all purchases. **3X** on travel. **4X** for a month for every referral.
### AI TRAVEL AGENT
## Introducing The Rover
Meet the future of travel booking: the first ever AI assistant tailored to discover and secure your ideal reward trips. Effortless planning, maximized rewards, and journeys tailored to you.
# Rewards Unleashed
Your travel portal to discover, book, and optimize loyalty reward deals for maximum value.
![](http://rovecard.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frewards_hand.26c1358e.webp&w=3840&q=75)
EVEN MORE BENEFITS
![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke.a412fbc0.svg)![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke_mobile.fb63db46.svg)
Extended warranty![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/plus.6baa53b8.svg)
Protect your purchases for longer. Our extended warranty coverage adds extra peace of mind to your shopping for up to an additional year and up to $50,000. 
![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke.a412fbc0.svg)![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke_mobile.fb63db46.svg)
Unlimited virtual cards![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/plus.6baa53b8.svg)
Enjoy the convenience of unlimited virtual cards for online transactions, making it a breeze to manage subscriptions and free trials hassle-free. Say goodbye to unexpected charges and hello to control and flexibility. 
![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke.a412fbc0.svg)![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke_mobile.fb63db46.svg)
Trip cancellation & delay coverage![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/plus.6baa53b8.svg)
Travel worry-free with our card. Our comprehensive trip cancellation and delay coverage ensures your journeys go smoothly, protecting you from unexpected travel disruptions. 
![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke.a412fbc0.svg)![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke_mobile.fb63db46.svg)
Zero fraud liability![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/plus.6baa53b8.svg)
Your security is paramount. With zero fraud liability, we've got you covered, so you can use your card worry-free, knowing that unauthorized transactions won't impact you. 
![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke.a412fbc0.svg)![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/divider_stroke_mobile.fb63db46.svg)
Exclusive merchant offers and bonuses![](http://rovecard.com/_next/static/media/plus.6baa53b8.svg)
Unlock a world of savings and rewards. Our credit card grants you access to exclusive offers and bonuses from our partner merchants, making every purchase an opportunity to save and earn even more. 
BENEFITS COMPARISON
See How We Compare
![](http://rovecard.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcomparison_bg.d1787817.png&w=3840&q=75)![](http://rovecard.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcomparison_rove_card.a695dc4b.png&w=1200&q=75)

  1. ACCEPTING A ROVE CARD AFTER YOUR APPLICATION IS APPROVED WILL RESULT IN A HARD CREDIT PULL, WHICH MAY IMPACT YOUR CREDIT SCORE.
  2. "SEE WHERE YOU CAN GO" IS AN ESTIMATE BASED ON RELIABLE HISTORICAL REWARDS DATA, BUT PLEASE NOTE THAT AWARD AVAILABILITY CANNOT BE GUARANTEED AND MAY NOT COVER TAX AND OTHER AIRLINE FEES.
  3. ALL LOGOS AND TRADEMARKS FEATURED HEREIN ARE THE SOLE PROPERTY OF THEIR RESPECTIVE OWNERS.
  4. VARIABLE APRS RANGE FROM 17.99% TO 29.99% BASED ON CREDITWORTHINESS. RATES AS OF SEPTEMBER 18TH, 2023.
  5. INDIVIDUAL CREDIT LIMITS WILL VARY BY APPLICANT AND ARE SUBJECT TO CREDIT APPROVAL AND UNDERWRITING.
  6. CARDHOLDERS MUST BE AT LEAST 18 YEARS OF AGE AND A CITIZEN OF THE UNITED STATES OR A PERMANENT RESIDENT WITH A VALID SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER (SSN) OR INDIVIDUAL TAXPAYER IDENTIFICATION NUMBER (ITIN).

generated_description:
### Rove: Revolutionizing Travel Rewards

Founded in 2023 and based in New York, Rove is on a mission to let you travel the world for free. The startup, which is part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, is tackling a gap in the travel industry by creating an accessible airline miles system redeemable across multiple international airlines and hotel chains.

#### What Does Rove Do?

Rove essentially offers a credit card that transforms how you earn and utilize travel rewards. With Rove, every purchase you make connects you to complimentary flights and hotel stays. They’ve rolled out several enticing features to make travel rewards more accessible and rewarding, including:

- **Dual Rewards System**: Cardholders earn **2X** points on all purchases, **3X** on travel, and a special **4X** for referrals during the first month.
- **AI Travel Assistant**: Rove introduces "The Rover," an AI-powered travel agent that helps users discover and book reward trips efficiently.
- **Rewards Optimization**: A platform designed to help users unlock maximum value from their loyalty rewards.

#### Additional Benefits

Rove isn't just another travel rewards card. They add a range of benefits that enhance the travel experience, such as:

- **Extended Warranties**: Purchase protection for up to a year.
- **Unlimited Virtual Cards**: Manage transactions easily, especially for online subscriptions.
- **Trip Coverage**: Trip cancellation and delay coverage, ensuring peace of mind.
- **Zero Fraud Liability**: Security against unauthorized transactions.
- **Exclusive Merchant Offers**: Access to unique promotions that make every dollar work harder for you.

#### The Team and Leadership

Despite being a young company, Rove boasts a small but agile team of four, driven by a commitment to make travel more enjoyable and less expensive. The company is backed by Tom Blomfield, a noted figure in the fintech landscape.

#### Conclusion

Rove is redefining what it means to earn travel rewards, leveraging technology to create a seamless experience for travelers. Their innovative approach not only looks to simplify how you collect loyalty rewards but also positions you to travel without incurring significant costs.

If you're interested in this new player in the travel industry, check them out at [rovecard.com](http://rovecard.com) and consider joining their waitlist for a chance to revolutionize your travel experience.
